sub_concepts.name: Covalent Bonds
sub_concepts.definition: Bonds formed by sharing electrons between atoms

sub_concepts.name: Lewis Structures
sub_concepts.definition: Structural formulas that represent the arrangement of atoms and electrons in a molecule

sub_concepts.name: Molecular Geometry
sub_concepts.definition: The 3D arrangement of atoms in a molecule

sub_concepts.name: Isomerism
sub_concepts.definition: Compounds with the same molecular formula but different structures
